trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: When Euroakus enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 blue Human Wizard creature tokens equal to the number of differently named lands you control. {4}{G}{U}: Draw a card for each Wizard you control. They each get +1/+1 until end of turn for each card in your hand.

trans-unit.note: 此牌名非官方翻译，需要校对！

trans-unit.source: Flying, haste Whenever Mountain Mover enters the battlefield or attacks, put a Mountain card from outside the game underneath it. When Mountain Mover leaves the battlefield, put all cards underneath it onto the battlefield. Crew 3

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Say the secret word: Add one mana of any color. Scry 1. You gain 1 life.
